title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Do Balloons Stick To Our Hair?
itunes:title: BrainStuff Classics: Why Do Balloons Stick To Our Hair?
description:
Recent research has deepened our understanding of balloons' hair-raising effect. Learn more in this classic episode of BrainStuff.
